rule-21-3-a.test_description: The project consists of one building segment with one zone.  Space conditioning is provided by system type 7 with boiler.  The baseline building's hot water system's sizing is based on coincident loads.  Expected result: PASS

standard.rule_description: When the baseline building is modeled with a hot water or chilled water plant the plant shall be sized based on coincident loads.

standard.rule_description: When the baseline building requires boilers, (for baseline system type = 1,5,7,11 and 12), for building area>15,000ft2, two equally sized boilers should be modeled. Else a single boiler shall be modeled.

standard.rule_description: For baseline building, fossil fuel systems shall be modeled using natural gas as their fuel source.
